faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.name: What's going on with this name?
faq.name_ans: This name is derived from the Esperanto meaning "together" The word:kune.
faq.openbook_ans: Yes, until a company sent out lawyers over the word book.
faq.whos_paying: Who pays all the fees so far?
faq.whos_paying_ans: This project was successfully crowdfunded in September 2018 and has been running on those funds with the support of our backers.
faq.want_to_help: I want to help now, what can I do?
faq.want_to_help_ans: We are happy and grateful that you are willing to help!
faq.many_ways: You can now help in many ways.
faq.talk_to_friends: Talk about us to your friends and family
faq.improve_website: If you are a developer, you can help us improve our website.
faq.translation: If you speak another language, you can help us translate the project.
faq.let_us_know: If you have any ideas about networking, let us know.
faq.public_figure: If you are a public figure and want to become an ambassador,
faq.looking_for_job: If you are looking for a job and believe this program is a good fit for you,
faq.volunteer: Finally, if you'd like to get more involved, we're forming a network of volunteers around the world to help us spread the word.
faq.why_not_decentralised_ans: Our roadmap includes building a federated login system that allows self-hosted instances to connect to the main network while being able to operate on their own.
